SIGN_IN.TITLE: Sign In
SIGN_IN.WELCOME: Welcome back, please login to your account.

SIGN_UP.TITLE: Sign Up
SIGN_UP.WELCOME: Welcome to Workify, let us start with creation of your account.

TERMS.FIRST: By signing up, you agree to our

ERRORS.DEFAULT: Try one more time, or try again later.
ERRORS.USERNAME_EXISTS: This username `already` exists, try with another one.
ERRORS.EMAIL_EXISTS: This email `already` exists, try with another one.
ERRORS.DB_ERROR: Application is facing some errors in the backend.
ERRORS.WRONG_DATA: Invalid data, make sure to double check the data before submitting.
ERRORS.USER_DOES_NOT_EXISTS: User does not exists, provide a valid email
ERRORS.WRONG_PASSWORD: Wrong password, if you have forgot the password, you can reset it.
